section.title: Mail
section.para: Zend_Mail provides generalized functionality to compose and send both text and MIME-compliant multipart e-mail messages. Mail can be sent with Zend_Mail via the default Zend_Mail_Transport_Sendmail transport or via Zend_Mail_Transport_Smtp. Learn more about Zend_Mail.

Majisti's mail model is, while heavily relying on Zend_Mail, a more object-oriented mail sending class, allowing to populate message bodies with multiple objects, thus encouraging the making of predefined message templates.
